about_the_game:
Whoever can climb that tower on TAKEUMA without dismounting once will be blessed with eternal happiness.
A boy on TAKEUMA was about to challenge the five towers, where such a rumor was circulating among the public......

TAKEUMA 2D is a game in which the player moves a boy on TAKEUMA to climb a tower where various gimmicks lie and take the boy to the top.
The controls are very simple, but the boy is on stilts and cannot stop, so climbing the tower may not be easy.
Each of the five odd-looking towers has a different gimmick, and will repeatedly knock you and the boy down as you try to climb to the top.
If you manage to climb all five towers without giving up, what lies ahead?
You will have to see for yourself how it ends.
There will be something there that you will not be able to see unless you complete the game yourself.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 105 MB available space

short_description: This is a 2D action game in which you take a boy on TAKEUMA to the top of a tower. The boy cannot stop because he is on TAKEUMA, but the controls are very easy. This game is perfect for those who enjoy challenging actions and the sense of accomplishment that comes after many attempts.
